rules:
    no-x-headers-response:
        x-tags:
            :
        description: 'HTTP' headers SHOULD NOT start with 'X-' RFC6648.
        severity: warn
        given:
            :
        message: HTTP response header SHOULD NOT start with 'X-' in {{path}}
        recommended: true
        type: style
        then:
            function: pattern
            functionOptions:
                match: /^([^x]|.[^-])|RateLimit-/i
